TextView.android:text: rUontime? helps you keep track of how punctual you are in a work environment and hopefully helps you get more punctual. The application is easy to use:

1. Your next meeting is displayed in the Home screen, with a timer telling you how much time remains. You'll get notified before a certain time that you can choose. When you attend the meeting, just click on the check-in button and scan the QR code.
2. In the Statistics screen we provide you with statistics about your punctually during the past meetings.
3. You can customize the application by clicking on the Settings screen; you can choose whether you want to get notified or not, what time...
